wikipedia_page.main: Timothy Swanson is an American economics scholar specializing in environmental governance, biodiversity, water management, as well as intellectual property rights and biotechnology regulation.He is a professor in resource economics at the Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies in Geneva.

link_mentions.page: Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies
response: *Timothy Swanson – André Hoffmann Professor of Environmental Economics.
